ygData.subject: Re: Well, I'd Say Orchestra could become one important guy soon!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thanks, Orchestra said. Orchestra and Composer remained seated. So Orchestra, what faction are you with? Composer asked. Well, replied Orchestra,

::Orchestra::

"Thanks," Orchestra said.

Orchestra and Composer remained seated.

"So Orchestra, what faction are you with?" Composer asked.

"Well," replied Orchestra, "I'm in a team of Predacons under a bot named
Darkfate.  But recently, he's been missing.  I have no idea where he went."

"Heh.  I serve the Alliance, as you've probably guessed, under Zardus,"
Composer said.

"Oh.  Interesting."

"Yeah."

It seemed the conversation bewteen the two brothers was getting nowhere.
Then, that's when the question popped up.

"Orchestra, would you.....join the Alliance?  For me?" Composer asked.

Orchestra didn't quite know what to say.

"Uh well....I would....but-"

"But what!?" Composer cut off.

"Well, you see.....I have a special somebody in my faction..." Orchestra
said.

"Hmm?"

"Her name's Blacknightmare.  I'm in love with her, and I don't know if I'm
ready to leave here," Orchestra said.

"Well, I'd like it if you made your decision soon....." Composer said.

"Umm......I think I'm gonna need some time to talk to her about this...."

"Well, okay, you make your decision right though, brother," Composer said.

Things were silent for a moment.  Then, the same thing went through the
minds of both brothers.

"What happened to Symphony?" Orchestra managed to ask it first.

"I haven't seen him.  He must've went off course too.  If he's still alive
on this rock, I'll be damned if we find him," Composer said.

"Yeah.  You know, he's probably with the Maximals!" Orchestra said.

Composer and Orchestra both laughed.  Little did they know that they were
actually right.

"Well, I think I'll stay here for a while," Orchestra said, remembering his
real mission.

"Alright.  Would you like me to give you a tour?" Composer offered.

Orchestra figured this would be the perfect chance to get to know the base
and perhaps get information.

"Yes, brother, that would be nice," Orchestra accepted.

The two got up, then Composer went to give Orchestra a tour.  Orchestra
followed...
